words.defineEn: a heat-resistant stand or mat used to protect a table or countertop from hot dishes or cookware
words.defineVi: giá đỡ hoặc thảm chịu nhiệt được sử dụng để bảo vệ bàn hoặc mặt bàn khỏi các món ăn hoặc dụng cụ nấu nướng nóng

examples: Even the heft of your cutlery can make a difference.
And what is nice is you get real metal cutlery to eat it with as well.
We all have this drawer filled with plastic cutlery, chopsticks, condiments that we never asked for.
I got my reusable travel cutlery and my ChicoBag, because I do plan to leave somewhere after and it would just be nice to have that on hand.
Her organization pressured major delivery apps to opt out of sending cutlery by default.
words.defineEn: the objects such as spoons, forks, and knives that are used for serving or eating food
words.defineVi: các đồ vật như thìa, nĩa và dao được sử dụng để phục vụ hoặc ăn thức ăn

examples: Let's now move away from the world of the hunter-gatherer and into the dinnerware market.
words.defineEn: the plates, bowls, cups, and other serving pieces that are used to set the table for a meal
words.defineVi: đĩa, bát, cốc và các đồ dùng khác được sử dụng để dọn bàn ăn

examples: The children enjoyed a bowl of chocolate cereal with cold milk and a glass of orange juice for breakfast.
He relished a warm bowl of mung bean soup.
He enjoyed a warm bowl of black-eyed pea soup.
I ordered a bowl of delicious oxtail soup for the first time.
A warm bowl of minestrone soup is even more comforting with a sprinkle of grated Parmesan cheese.
words.defineEn: a round, deep container with an open top, used for holding food or liquid
words.defineVi: một vật chứa tròn, sâu có nắp hở, dùng để đựng thức ăn hoặc chất lỏng

examples: I dropped another plate!
They used disposable plates for the picnic.
The restaurant served a mouthwatering plate of spaghetti with bolognese pasta sauce.
Our waiter cleared the empty plates from the table.
The plate of pasta was finished with a garnish of grated Parmesan cheese.
words.defineEn: a flat, typically round dish that we eat from or serve food on
words.defineVi: một đĩa phẳng, thường tròn mà chúng ta ăn hoặc phục vụ thức ăn trên

words.defineEn: a small dish, usually about 6 to 9 inches in diameter, used for serving desserts or small appetizers

words.defineEn: a small plate typically used for serving bread and butter alongside a meal
words.defineVi: một đĩa nhỏ thường được sử dụng để phục vụ bánh mì và bơ cùng với bữa ăn

examples: But when fish disappear from the oceans, they will also disappear from our dinner plates.

Ultimately, with the passage of years, the survivors will increase in size, from that of a dinner plate at year one to that of a dinner table, in the case of one species at least, the leatherback, a decade or so later.
Smith started on his journey as a seaweed farmer, touting the many food possibilities before he realized seaweed could be something much bigger than a piece of the dinner plate.
New fuel blends may help raise octane levels in cars at a lower cost, and one of them may include something you typically see on your dinner plate.
You can find seaweed in more than just your dinner plate at your favorite Asian restaurant.
words.defineEn: a type of dishware designed to serve the main course of a meal and typically measures around 10-12 inches in diameter
words.defineVi: một loại bát đĩa được thiết kế để phục vụ món chính của bữa ăn và thường có đường kính khoảng 10-12 inch

examples: So, you can use the Blackmagic control grip or a side plate.
words.defineEn: a small plate which is used for serving bread or other items of food during a meal

words.defineVi: một đĩa cỡ nhỏ hơn được sử dụng để phục vụ món salad hoặc món khai vị

examples: I do buy my creamer there because I can't get it in the store where I live now.
In the case of the spoiled creamer, Amazon did offer to compensate Atkinson after she spoke to CNBC in October.
Among the recent food products that customers say arrived expired or tampered with are various coffee creamers, Doritos, Fiji water bottles and Similac baby formula.
On a more recent box of creamer Atkinson purchased on Amazon in January, it included a bright green sticker explaining something called septic packaging.
A CNBC analysis found expired hot sauce, beef jerky, granola bars, Doritos, coffee creamer and baby food.
words.defineEn: a small pitcher or jug, usually with a spout and a handle, used for serving cream or milk alongside coffee or tea

examples: This dish will serve four hungry people.

examples: You've just got ta try Salt Right from the Salt Shaker.

words.defineVi: một thùng chứa có lỗ trên đỉnh được sử dụng để phân phối muối
